CmdLine: echo "@edge http://nl.alpinelinux.org/alpine/edge/main" >> /etc/apk/repositories &&     echo "@community http://nl.alpinelinux.org/alpine/edge/community" >> /etc/apk/repositories &&     echo "@testing http://nl.alpinelinux.org/alpine/edge/testing" >> /etc/apk/repositories && 	apk update && 	apk add runit@community wget bzip2 unzip bash tzdata && 	cp /usr/share/zoneinfo/UTC /etc/localtime && 	echo "Etc/UTC" > /etc/timezone && 	apk del tzdata &&     addgroup -g 999 lo-daemon &&     adduser lo-daemon -D -u 999 -G lo-daemon -S -h /services/ -s /bin/bash &&     echo 'hosts: files mdns4_minimal [NOTFOUND=return] dns mdns4' >> /etc/nsswitch.conf &&     rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*
Commands.Name: run
